subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Here's a weirder one.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
This voice was picked up out of the air as the meeting was just starting. 
The mic was intended to pick up peopel that turn their heads away form their 
mics, which causes their voices not to be recorded. We record the board 
meetings, and save it as part of the public records.

Frank
